title: Can I never play League again?
body:
All the Files in my Riot Folder at C: are gone, its just RADS and the Old League of Legend launchers.

My computer is up to date, My connection is fine, I did the Hextech Repair tool, Running and installing as Admin didn't work, I reinstalled it, I've done everything!

But League still wont open, so i cant update it back to Leagueclient.exe, its still the Old lol.launcher and it wont open, Regular and Admin

The Old Title appears switches over to the new title then its never opens again.

Please for the love of god, Riot, what do i do?!

replies.body: Hmmmmm if you're missing most of those game files, you might need to do a full reinstall and clean uninstall to make sure you've got a working installation of the game by this point. Grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) again and make sure to run it with both **reinstall and clean uninstall** checked.
I did you told me to do that last week(or some time ago), and it still didnt work, all files are still missing
